overview: Two home invaders bond through the crimes they commit. However, they do it for different reasons. One desperately does it for money, and one does it for the rush of power and adrenaline. One is rich... one is poor. And through envy, and greed, one turns on the other.
tagline: One is rich... one is poor. And through envy, and greed, one turns on the other.
title: Root of All Evil.
